issues.title: Project Layout & Navigation
issues.description:
Three-column layout: Sidebar (left), Main Kanban (center), Details Panel (right)
- Responsive sidebar with project list and user profile
- Top navigation bar with search and filters
- Dark theme with slate-900 background and orange-500 accents
- Smooth transitions between views
test_steps: Sidebar displays project list correctly
Navigation elements are clickable and functional
Layout is responsive and maintains structure
Color scheme matches specification (slate-900, orange-500)

issues.title: Kanban Board Structure
issues.description:
Three columns: "To Do", "In Progress", "Done"
- Column headers with task counts
- Visual distinction between columns
- Smooth animations when columns update
- Empty state handling for columns with no tasks
test_steps: All three columns render correctly
Task counts display accurately in headers
Empty columns show appropriate messaging
Column styling matches design (borders, spacing, colors)

issues.title: Task Cards Display
issues.description:
Compact task cards with: title, description, priority badge, assignee avatar, due date
- Priority indicators: High (red), Medium (orange), Low (gray)
- Status indicators with colored dots
- Tags/labels with pill-style design
- Truncated text with hover to see full content
test_steps: Task cards display all information correctly
Priority badges show correct colors
Avatars render properly
Due dates format correctly (using date-fns)
Hover states work smoothly

issues.title: Drag & Drop Functionality
issues.description:
Drag tasks between columns (To Do ↔ In Progress ↔ Done)
- Drag to reorder within same column
- Visual feedback during drag (lifted card, drop zones highlighted)
- Smooth animations (60fps) during drag operations
- Persist new positions to state
test_steps: Can drag task from "To Do" to "In Progress"
Can drag task from "In Progress" to "Done"
Can reorder tasks within same column
Drop zones highlight on drag over
Card returns to original position if dropped outside valid zone
State updates correctly after drop

issues.title: Task Detail Modal
issues.description:
Click any task card to open detail modal
- Modal shows: full title, description, priority, assignee, due date, comments section
- Edit mode for task properties
- Close modal with X button or ESC key
- Dark overlay with smooth fade-in/fade-out animation
test_steps: Clicking task opens modal with correct data
Modal displays all task details
Edit fields are functional
ESC key closes modal
Click outside modal closes it
Animations are smooth (fade in/out)

issues.title: Add New Task
issues.description:
"+ " button in each column header to add task to that column
- Modal form with fields: title (required), description, priority, assignee, due date
- Form validation (title required)
- Cancel button to discard
- Create button adds task to correct column
test_steps: Click "+" button opens create modal
Form fields are functional
Cannot submit without title
Created task appears in correct column
Task has unique ID
Modal closes after creation

issues.title: Zustand Store & State Management
issues.description:
Global state with Zustand store for: tasks, columns, filters, selected task
- Actions: addTask, updateTask, deleteTask, moveTask, reorderTask
- localStorage persistence (auto-save on every state change)
- Hydration on app load from localStorage
- Type-safe state and actions
test_steps: State updates reflect immediately in UI
Refresh page - data persists from localStorage
Multiple operations (add, move, delete) work correctly
No console errors related to state management
State structure matches TypeScript types

issues.title: Polish & Responsive Design
issues.description:
Smooth animations everywhere (hover states, transitions, drag & drop)
- Responsive breakpoints: mobile (< 768px), tablet (768-1024px), desktop (> 1024px)
- Mobile: stacked layout with tabs for columns
- Tablet: two-column layout
- Desktop: full three-column layout with sidebar and right panel
- Loading states and skeleton screens
- Micro-interactions (button hover, card lift, etc.)
test_steps: Animations are smooth (60fps, no jank)
Test on mobile viewport (< 768px) - layout adapts
Test on tablet viewport (768-1024px) - layout adapts
Test on desktop viewport (> 1024px) - full layout
Hover states work on all interactive elements
No layout shift or broken styles at any breakpoint

issues.title: [META] Project Progress Tracker
issues.description: This issue tracks session progress and context for the orchestrator.

instructions:
This file contains the complete specification for creating the Michel Dashboard project in Linear. To complete the setup, you need to:

1. Create a new Linear project named 'Michel Dashboard'
2. Create 9 issues (8 features + 1 META) using the data in this file
3. Update this JSON with the actual Linear project_id, team_id, meta_issue_id, and all issue_ids

Issue Creation Guide:
- Use Linear's web UI or API to create each issue
- For each issue, use: title, description (from 'description' field), and add a 'Test Steps' comment with the items from 'test_steps' array
- All issues should start with status 'Todo' and priority 'Normal'
- The META issue should have an initial comment: 'Session 1 started: Project initialized'
